short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open the node.js devtools from the command-line; no more clicking, selecting or copy & pasting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: rawkit grabs the chrome inspector URL returned from the node --inspect command and immediately opens devtools. No more clicking, selecting, copying/pasting or navigating. Just run the command and jump into debugging.
